sch:rule.sch:assert: Behavior Mechanism Objects must have an inline Datastream representing a Datastream Input Spec (element amdSec with ID="DSINPUTSPEC" must exist when element mets has TYPE="FedoraBMechObject"
Behavior Mechanism Objects must have an inline Datastream representing a Fedora Method Map (element amdSec with ID="METHODMAP" must exist when element mets has TYPE="FedoraBMechObject"
Behavior Mechanism Objects must have an inline Datastream representing WSDL service bindings (element amdSec with ID="WSDL" must exist when element mets has TYPE="FedoraBMechObject"

Behavior Definition Objects must have an inline Datastream representing a Fedora Method Map of abstract method defs (element amdSec with ID="METHODMAP" must exist when element mets has TYPE="FedoraBDefObject"
Object must be of type "FedoraObject|FedoraBDefObject|FedoraBMechObject" (element mets: TYPE)
All Datastreams must have a DatastreamID (element fileGrp: ID is missing or empty)
Datastreams section encoding error (element fileSec: must have child fileGrp whose ID is "DATASTREAMS"
Datastreams section encoding error (element fileSec: can only have one fileGrp as direct decendant)
Every Datastream must have a DatastreamID (element fileGrp: ID is missing)
Datastream control group must be recorded (element file: OWNERID missing or empty)
Datastream control group must be "P" for Protected-External-Ref, "E" for External-Ref, "M" for Managed-Internal, "R" for Redirect, or "X" for Inline-XML-User-Metadata. (element file: OWNERID)
Every Disseminator must have a DisseminatorID (element behaviorSec: ID is missing or empty)
Disseminator must have a versionID (element behaviorSec/serviceBinding: ID is missing or empty)
Disseminator must point to a Behavior Definition Object (element behaviorSec/serviceBinding/interfaceMD: xlink:href is missing or empty)
Disseminator must point to a Behavior Mechanism Object (element behaviorSec/serviceBinding/serviceBindMD: xlink:href is missing or empty)
Object must have a date of creation (element header: CREATEDATE missing)
Datastream state must be recorded (element file: STATUS missing or empty)
Datastream state must be "A" for Active, "W" for Withdrawn, "C" for Pending Deletion, or "D" for Deleted. (element file: STATUS)
Disseminator state must be recorded (element behaviorSec: STATUS missing or empty)
Disseminator state must be "A" for Active, "W" for Withdrawn, "C" for Pending Deletion, or "D" for Deleted. (element behaviorSec: STATUS)
Disseminator must have a date of creation (element behaviorSec/serviceBinding: CREATED missing)
Inline Metadata Datastream must have an id (element amdSec: ID missing)
Inline Metadata Datastream state must be recorded (element amdSec: STATUS missing or empty)
Inline Metadata Datastream state must be "A" for Active, "W" for Withdrawn, "C" for Pending Deletion, or "D" for Deleted. (element amdSec: STATUS)
Inline Metadata Datastream must have an id (element dmdSecFedora: ID missing)
Inline Metadata Datastream state must be recorded (element dmdSecFedora: STATUS missing or empty)
Inline Metadata Datastream state must be "A" for Active, "W" for Withdrawn, "C" for Pending Deletion, or "D" for Deleted. (element dmdSecFedora: STATUS)
Inline Metadata Datastream must have a date of creation (element descMD: CREATED missing)
Inline Metadata Datastream must have a version id (element descMD: ID missing)
Inline Metadata Datastream must have a date of creation (element techMD: CREATED missing)
Inline Metadata Datastream must have a version id (element techMD: ID missing)
Inline Metadata Datastream must have a date of creation (element rightsMD: CREATED missing)
Inline Metadata Datastream must have a version id (element rightsMD: ID missing)
Inline Metadata Datastream must have a date of creation (element sourceMD: CREATED missing)
Inline Metadata Datastream must have a version id (element sourceMD: ID missing)
Inline Metadata Datastream must have a date of creation (element digiprovMD: CREATED missing)
Inline Metadata Datastream must have a version id (element digiprovMD: ID missing)
